document_data.name: ''Butterflies in the Stomach''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Butterflies in the Stomach''''' was a [[potion]] made by [[Auntie Ethel]], the [[green hag]] that dwelled in the [[Gnarled Teahouse]] on the [[Western Heartlands]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: It was formulated with ingredients that included [[ergot]] and [[nutmeg]].
document_data.Powers: This potion was meant to recreate the physical sensation many people felt when falling in love. Unfortunately, or perhaps purposefully, it caused internal hemorrhaging within the digestive tract.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, ''Butterflies in the Stomach'' could only be found within Auntie Ethel's [[Ancient Abode]].
